name: Kingdom Raids
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Kingdom Raids is a blockchain-based strategy Role-playing game (RPG) developed by a leading gaming studio, TAG Labs. The game take place in a fictional kingdom, “Dood Kingdom”, a land of mystery and adventure with over 40 heroes in the mystic world, each possessing unique abilities.  
 
Kingdom Raids will offer various in-game activities for players such as Player versus player (PvP) and Player versus environment (PvE). Join us in exploring dungeons, battling tournaments, and building clans.
